hero-description: Specialized consulting in sustainable energy, advanced electronics and professional technical services. We transform ideas into real solutions.
tech-description: Sustainable energy solutions, advanced robotics and cutting-edge electronics.
services-description: Professional inspection, homologation and specialized technical audit.
business-description: Global expansion, strategic outsourcing and international technology collaboration.
contact-description: Let's talk about how we can help transform your project into reality.
mission-text: Transform innovative ideas into real technological solutions, connecting European companies with global markets through specialized consulting in sustainable energy, advanced electronics and highest-quality technical services.
vision-text: To be the leading technological bridge between Europe and Asia, driving transformation towards a sustainable future through technological innovation and international collaboration.
contact-response-text: We respond within 24 hours on business days
form-success: Message sent successfully! We will respond soon.
form-error: There was an error sending the message. Please try again or contact us directly at contacto@rebollution.com
tech-page-subtitle: Sustainable energy and advanced electronics for a cleaner future
hydrogen-intro: Development of green hydrogen solutions as the energy vector of the future. Projects for production, storage and distribution of H2 for industrial decarbonization.
hydrogen-plant-desc: Design of green hydrogen production plant through alkaline electrolysis. Capacity: 5 MW.
hydrogen-storage-desc: Hydrogen storage and compression system for industrial applications and mobility.
wind-intro: Consulting and development of onshore and offshore wind farms. Feasibility analysis, facility design and energy production optimization.
wind-park-desc: Complete development of onshore wind farm with 15 state-of-the-art wind turbines.
wind-maintenance-desc: IoT monitoring system and predictive maintenance for wind farm optimization.
solar-intro: High-efficiency photovoltaic solar installations for distributed generation and utility-scale plants. Integration with storage systems.
solar-plant-desc: Design and implementation of photovoltaic plant with solar tracking and storage system.
solar-selfconsumption-desc: Photovoltaic self-consumption solutions for industrial energy cost reduction.
biomass-intro: Energy utilization of organic waste and forest biomass. Cogeneration plants and sustainable biofuel production.
biomass-plant-desc: Electricity generation plant from forest and agricultural waste in the region.
robotics-intro: Robotic systems for industrial automation, inspection and maintenance. AI and computer vision integration.
robot-inspection-desc: Autonomous robot for critical infrastructure inspection with computer vision and NDT sensors.
robot-arm-desc: Production line automation system with precise control and collaborative safety.
cybersecurity-intro: Protection of critical infrastructure and industrial systems. Security audits and incident response plans.
cyber-audit-desc: Security assessment in SCADA systems and industrial OT networks.
automation-intro: Control and automation systems for Industry 4.0. IoT integration, digital twins and real-time monitoring.
automation-twin-desc: Implementation of digital twin for real-time production process optimization.
automation-scada-desc: Development of supervision and control system for water treatment plant.
mobility-intro: Autonomous vehicles, fleet management systems and intelligent electric mobility solutions.
mobility-autonomous-desc: Autonomous vehicle prototype for industrial environments with LiDAR systems and AI.
services-page-subtitle: Inspection, homologation and highest-quality technical audit
inspection-intro: Professional technical inspection services with NDT photography and exhaustive documentation. Experience in Oil & Gas, civil construction and hydrology.
inspection-oilgas-desc: Inspection of petrochemical facilities with advanced NDT techniques and infrared thermography.
inspection-civil-desc: Inspection of structures, foundations and civil works. Technical report with detailed photography.
inspection-hydro-desc: Inspection of hydraulic infrastructure, dams and water treatment systems.
homologation-intro: Comprehensive management of homologation and certification processes. Consulting on national and international regulatory compliance.
homologation-ce-desc: Complete processing for CE marking of industrial machinery and electronic products.
homologation-iso-desc: Consulting for implementation and certification of quality and environmental management systems.
audit-intro: Specialized technical audits in industrial and technological projects. Risk analysis and process optimization.
audit-energy-desc: Analysis of industrial energy efficiency with improvement plan and estimated ROI.
audit-due-desc: Comprehensive technical assessment for M&A operations in industrial and technology sectors.
business-page-subtitle: We expand your business to global markets with proven strategies
localization-intro: We facilitate entry of European companies into Asian markets. Local knowledge, network of contacts and commercial regulation experience.
localization-china-desc: Opening of operations in Shanghai and Shenzhen for European technology company. Legal establishment and business structure.
localization-india-desc: Strategic alliance facilitation with local partner in Chennai for electronic components manufacturing.
outsourcing-intro: Technology outsourcing services with verified partners. Cost optimization while maintaining European quality standards.
outsourcing-software-desc: Management of offshore team in India for enterprise application development with agile methodology.
outsourcing-electronics-desc: Coordination of PCB production in Shenzhen with European quality control and integrated logistics.
collaboration-intro: Establishment of technology alliances for co-development of innovative products. Bidirectional knowledge transfer.
collaboration-rd-desc: Collaborative research project in solid-state batteries with Chinese university and European company.
aspirations-intro: Projects under development and future collaboration opportunities in emerging markets.
aspirations-hub-desc: Establishment of innovation center in Singapore as a bridge between Europe and Asia-Pacific.
aspirations-markets-desc: Exploration of opportunities in Vietnam, Thailand and Indonesia for engineering services.
mission-page-subtitle: The principles that guide our work and our relationships with clients and partners
mission-description: Transform innovative ideas into real technological solutions, connecting European companies with global markets through specialized consulting in sustainable energy, advanced electronics and professional technical services. We are committed to delivering measurable results and creating lasting partnerships with our clients.
vision-description: To be the leading technological bridge between Europe and Asia, driving transformation towards a sustainable future through technological innovation and international collaboration. We envision a world where technology serves both business success and environmental responsibility, creating lasting value for our clients, partners and the communities we serve.
values-subtitle: Six fundamental principles that define our organizational culture and commitment
value-innovation-desc: We constantly seek new solutions and technologies that create real value for our clients. Innovation drives us to challenge the status quo and explore emerging opportunities in sustainable energy and advanced technologies.
value-quality-desc: We are committed to technical excellence and compliance with the highest international standards. Every project is delivered with precision, attention to detail and commitment to exceed expectations.
value-sustainability-desc: We prioritize projects that contribute to a cleaner, more sustainable future for coming generations. Environmental responsibility is integrated into every decision and solution we develop.
value-collaboration-desc: We believe in the power of strategic alliances and bidirectional knowledge transfer. Success is built through partnerships where everyone contributes and grows together.
value-trust-desc: We build long-term relationships based on transparency, honesty and commitment fulfillment. Trust is earned through consistent delivery and ethical business practices in all operations.
value-global-desc: We understand local markets with an international perspective, connecting cultures and opportunities. Our presence in Europe and Asia allows us to be a bridge between markets and facilitate global growth.
commitment-description: At Rebollution, we are committed to delivering solutions that make a real difference. We measure our success not just by project completion, but by the lasting impact we create for our clients, partners and the communities we serve. Our mission is to be a trusted partner in your technological transformation journey. When you choose Rebollution, you choose a partner dedicated to your success and the sustainable future we build together.
cta-mission-desc: Join us in building sustainable, innovative solutions that create real value.
contact-page-subtitle: Get in touch with our team. We respond within 24 hours.
